elements.text:
To run a server, you need to have a JDK installed.
Either you do not have it, or it's not up to date.

Click the button below to download it automatically,
or go to https://www.oracle.com/java/technologies/downloads/
 to download it manually.

Once downloaded, restart the program.

If you have downloaded the JDK but you're still getting this popup,
make sure java and javac are in your environment variables and restart your computer.
